title: Tostones with Guacamole
instructions: Step 1: Place the avocado in a bowl and mash them with the tines of a fork.
Step 2: The eggs, once the shells are removed, are also chopped and added to the avocado.
Step 3: Season with salt, pepper, coriander and lemon juice.
Step 4: Mix all the ingredients perfectly well and refrigerate to be served later with the tostones.
